# apizel

> Thin fetch wrapper for TypeScript. Lightweight, standards-compliant, and predictable.

## Links

- [Documentation](https://apizel.liha.dev/)
- [Full Documentation for AI](https://apizel.liha.dev/llms-full.txt)
- [Repository](https://github.com/liha-labs/apizel)

## Features

- ✅ **Small & predictable**: No unnecessary abstractions.
- ✅ **TanStack Query friendly**: Respects `signal`, uses Abort for `timeoutMs`.
- ✅ **Minimal axios-like body**: FormData passthrough, JSON Content-Type fallback.
- ✅ **401 refresh retry**: Single-flight refresh logic, retry once.
- ✅ **Observe hooks**: `onRequest` / `onResponse` for observation only.
- ✅ **Extend client**: `api.extend(overrides)` で共通設定から派生クライアントを生成。

## Usage Summary

```ts
import { apizel } from '@liha-labs/apizel'

const api = apizel({ baseURL: 'https://api.example.com' })
const usersApi = api.extend({ baseURL: 'https://users.example.com' })
const data = await api.get<DTO>('/endpoint')
```
